OptionChoice.name: enableThaumcraft6
OptionChoice.Description: Should Custom Ore Generation handle Thaumcraft 6 ore generation?

Choice.description: Use Custom Ore Generation to handle Thaumcraft 6 ores.
Thaumcraft 6 ores will be handled by Minecraft directly.

OptionChoice.name: cleanUpThaumcraft6
OptionChoice.Description: Should Custom Ore Generation use the Substitution Pass to remove all instances of Thaumcraft 6 ore from the world? If the mod's oregen can be turned off in its configuration, then it's recommended to do so, as the substitution pass can slow the game significantly. If this option is disabled without disabling the mod's own ore generation, you'll end up with two oregens working at once, flooding the world with ore. Enabled by default to ensure the ores are completely removed.

Choice.description: Use the substitution pass to clean up Thaumcraft 6 ores.
Thaumcraft 6 ores do not need to be cleaned up by a substitution pass.

Choice.Description: Short and sparsely filled compound veins containing one material inside another.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Amber is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: thm6AmberFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Thaumcraft 6 Amber distributions

OptionNumeric.name: thm6AmberSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Thaumcraft 6 Amber distributions

Choice.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Cinnabar is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: thm6CinnabarFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Thaumcraft 6 Cinnabar distributions

OptionNumeric.name: thm6CinnabarSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Thaumcraft 6 Cinnabar distributions

OptionChoice.name: thm6MountainCinnabarDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Mountain Cinnabar is generated

Choice.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Mountain Cinnabar is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: thm6MountainCinnabarFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Thaumcraft 6 Mountain Cinnabar distributions

OptionNumeric.name: thm6MountainCinnabarSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Thaumcraft 6 Mountain Cinnabar distributions

Choice.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Quartz is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: thm6QuartzFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Thaumcraft 6 Quartz distributions

OptionNumeric.name: thm6QuartzSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Thaumcraft 6 Quartz distributions

Substitute.name: thm6OverworldBlockSubstitute0
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).

Veins.name: thm6AmberVeins
Veins.Description: Short sparsely filled veins sloping up from near the bottom of the map.

Cloud.name: thm6AmberCloud
Cloud.Description: Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore. These are huge, spanning several adjacent chunks, and consequently rather rare. They contain a sizeable amount of ore, but it takes some time and effort to mine due to low density. The intent for strategic clouds is that the player will need to actively search for one and then set up a semi- permanent mining base and spend some time actually mining the ore.

Veins.name: thm6AmberHintVeins
Veins.Description: Single blocks, generously scattered through all heights (density is about that of vanilla iron ore). They will replace dirt and sandstone (but not grass or sand), so they can be found nearer to the surface than most ores. Intened to be used as a child distribution for large, rare strategic deposits that would otherwise be very difficult to find. Note that the frequency is multiplied by ground level to maintain a constant density, but not by ore frequency because it is assumed that the frequency of the parent distribution will already be scaled by that.

StandardGen.name: thm6AmberStandard
StandardGen.Description: A master preset for standardgen ore distributions.

Veins.name: thm6CinnabarVeins
Veins.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore. Because they contain less ore per volume, these veins are relatively wide and long. Mining the ore from them is time consuming compared to solid ore veins. They are also more difficult to follow, since it is harder to get an idea of their direction while mining.

Veins.Description: Ore generation is doubled in preferred biomes.
